name: Thokk the Unbothered
response: Thokk the Unbothered is your go- to troll for all things nonchalant. This moss- draped icon of indifference spends its days shrugging off life' s chaos, worshipping Insurance with all its grimy heart—probably composing mossy sonnets if it had parchment. Pharma gets a grudging nod, while Crypto fades into the background like distant thunder. Thokk is here to remind you that chill vibes are key.
Trump: You don't seem to like Trump, well why not invest in his social media company or his totally rediculus coin?Truth social (DJT:NASDAQ ), Trump Coin, ACVF ETF · American Conservative Values ETF
Musk: Not in Love with Elon, well as a troll Investor you should invest in Tesla
Harris: The woke agenda of Harris is not your dream scenario. As a troll let's invest in some of the wokest companies on the planet:Disney, BlackRock, PepsiCo
enironment: You have a balanced view about the enivronment.. Nothing for a troll to get excited about
insurance: Blood suckers as they are with focus of profit rather than customers, here are some insurance alternatives UnitedHealth Group, Zurich Insurance Group, iShares STOXX Europe 600 Insurance UCITS ETF, iShares U.S. Insurance ETF
crypto: You see the usefullness of Crypto. You won't be happy if it goes to 0. It is not for a Troll!
pharma: Here are some pharcutical companies that I don't think you would mind if there profit went down: AmerisourceBergen, pfizer, GSK (GlaxoSmithKline), iShares MSCI World Health Care Sector ESG UCITS ETF USD
